description: This Dart source file defines a PersistenceService class that provides an in-memory storage mechanism for MenuRun objects, including methods for saving, loading, listing, and clearing runs. The class implements the singleton pattern and includes asynchronous methods simulating storage operations.

classes.name: PersistenceService
classes.description: A singleton service class providing in-memory storage for MenuRun objects with save, load, list, and clear functionalities.

methods.name: PersistenceService.get I
methods.description: Accessor for the singleton instance of PersistenceService.

methods.name: saveRun
methods.description: Saves a MenuRun object into the in-memory store asynchronously.

methods.name: loadRun
methods.description: Retrieves a MenuRun by ID asynchronously, returning null if not found or on error.

methods.name: listRuns
methods.description: Returns a list of all stored MenuRun objects asynchronously.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all stored runs; mainly for testing purposes.
